text: Robert L. Vining Jr. (March 30, 1931 â€“ September 1, 2022) was an American lawyer and politician. He was the United States district judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of Georgia from 1979 to 2022. He was nominated to the court by President Jimmy Carter. Vining Jr. was born in Chatsworth, Georgia. Vining Jr. died on September 1, 2022 in Dalton, Georgia at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Lawyers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American judges
title: Robert L. Vining Jr.
